name: Spin
description: 用于页面和区块的加载中状态 至 页面局部处于等待异步数据或正在渲染过程时，合适的加载动效会有效缓解用户的焦虑

props.name: ignoreConfig
props.description: 内部属性，是否忽略全局配置

examples.title: Basic
*    -- Set different animation effects by configuring `name`, and set animation size by configuring `size`
Basic
examples.description: After setting the `tip` text, you can use the `mode` property to set the layout mode: horizontal or vertical

examples.title: Wrapper
examples.description: Spin can be used as a container, just wrap it in the outer layer

examples.title: Tip
examples.description: Set the `tip` property to customize the text
